6// NodeSearch.h: Utilities for searching translator node graphs
7//
8
9#ifndef COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TREEUTIL_NODESEARCH_H_
10#define COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TREEUTIL_NODESEARCH_H_
11
12#include "compiler/translator/tree_util/IntermTraverse.h"
13
14namespace sh
15{
16
17template <class Parent>
18class NodeSearchTraverser : public TIntermTraverser
19{
20 public:
21 NodeSearchTraverser() : TIntermTraverser(true, false, false), mFound(false) {}
22
23 bool found() const { return mFound; }
24
25 static bool search(TIntermNode *node)
26 {
27 Parent searchTraverser;
28 node->traverse(&searchTraverser);
29 return searchTraverser.found();
30 }
31
32 protected:
33 bool mFound;
34};
35
36class FindDiscard : public NodeSearchTraverser<FindDiscard>
37{
38 public:
39 bool visitBranch(Visit visit, TIntermBranch *node) override
40 {
41 switch (node->getFlowOp())
42 {
43 case EOpKill:
44 mFound = true;
45 break;
46
47 default:
48 break;
49 }
50
51 return !mFound;
52 }
53};
54} // namespace sh
55
56#endif // COMPILER_TRANSLATOR_TREEUTIL_NODESEARCH_H_
57
